name: RogueGods
summary:
ACT I DEMO – FREE

RogueGods fuses roguelite action with deck-building strategy in XR: every card turns into a weapon you wield with your own hand. Starting 2 September 2025 you can download this Early-Access demo and play the entire Act I—randomised nodes, shops, altars, and epic duels against mythic foes. Each run lasts 30-45 minutes and never repeats.

DEMO CONTENT
• Playable hero: Heracles
• 60 + starter cards (attacks, defenses, powers, allies…)
• 20 relic rings with unique passive abilities
• Act...
